line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Adds signals to most types of ships in the universe. These signals will catch the ships for renaming.
* Queries ships in galaxy and checks if name already coloured and colours the name if not.
* Hack to make Pirate Guild Frigate behave, sometimes its name reverts and could not work out why.

sval.val: DESCRIPTION: Adds signals to most types of ships in the universe. These signals will catch the ships for renaming.
Queries ships in galaxy and checks if name already coloured and colours the name if not.
Hack to make Pirate Guild Frigate behave, sometimes its name reverts and could not work out why.
